Address.label: Address
Address.value: 1061 EAST INDIANTOWN ROAD,SUITE 110, JUPITER, Florida, 33477, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Jupiter Wellness Inc is a wellness hemp-derived cannabidiol, consumer product development company. It is engaged in manufacturing, distributing, and marketing of consumer products infused with CBD. Its products include CaniSun, CaniSkin and CaniDermRX. Under the CaniSun brand name. The business has two reportable segments sales and development of cannabidiol (CBD) based skincare and therapeutic products and sales of merchandise sold to theme parks.
